alert.note: Alert for Codington; Deuel (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 25 at 1:53AM MST until January 26 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Codington and Deuel Counties. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST today. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
